Class SessionEventHandler

extends java.lang.Object

      • logMessage

        @Deprecated
public void logMessage(java.lang.String message,
                         java.lang.Object... params)
        Deprecated. 
        Logs a string message Usage: logMessage("This is %d %s message", 1, "format string") -> logs message: "This is 1 format string message"
        Parameters:
        message - The message to log, can be a format string
        params - format arguments in case message is a format string.

      • offered

        public void offered(java.util.List<NegotiationPartyInternal> parties,
           Bid bid,
           Bid agreed,
           Session session)
        some offer was placed. Broadcast MultipartyNegotiationOfferEvent containing the details.
        Parameters:
        parties - The parties involved in the offer
        bid - the bid that was offered
        agreed - the agreement bid, or null if no agreement reached yet.
        session - the session

      • logSessionEnded

        public void logSessionEnded(Session session,
                   Bid agreement,
                   java.util.List<NegotiationPartyInternal> parties)
        General session log. Called at start and end of each negotiation session
        Parameters:
        session - The session to log
        agreement - The agreement if any (NULL otherwise)
